channel.title: Delete item from bank when they log in[317][Delta]
channel.description:
i want to add a piece of code in the login method wich checks if the player has an item in his bank\inv and then deletes if he has it. :cool:
please, if you have another suggestion to what i can do like: reset everyone.
don't even bother posting here. that would be considered 'spamming' (in my head) i'm simply looking for a answer, not a suggestion.

item.title: Delete item from bank when they log in[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

First off, why don’t you make a login method your self. Lets say when they login it checks their inv first and this is rather easy.

If player has item > Phat/Noted Phat
Delete it.

Do NOT send a message, this will alarm and then other players would know and never logout with a phat in/on.

Another way if they have it on.

If player has hat on > remove and delete or just delete.
Send a message now.

Bank would almost be like this, since I don’t have your source in front of me or any for that matter I can’t tell you how to take them out of the bank.

Please note that all the code that I have theorized can be found in your client or whatever you have.

Read full topic

i really dont want to reset everyone, so i’m saying: wont work
i guess
but, there gotta be someone out there who knows how to do this…

[quote=“str2own99, post:2, topic:369835”]go to their character and scroll down till u see sumthing like this

[BANK] character-bank = 0 9759 1 character-bank = 1 4414 1 character-bank = 2 6108 1 character-bank = 3 6111 1 character-bank = 4 1624 1 character-bank = 5 9177 1 character-bank = 6 9140 1000 character-bank = 7 3205 1 character-bank = 8 1172 1 character-bank = 9 1622 1 character-bank = 10 559 600 character-bank = 11 557 200 character-bank = 12 555 200 character-bank = 13 556 200 character-bank = 14 1382 1 character-bank = 15 668 1 character-bank = 16 561 200
then just delete the line[/quote]

well, what i want is a piece of code that deletes in a item from their bank. something like

deleteItem(itemID, Amount);

exept that i want it to delete from the players bank and not their inventory.
